fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Submerge a player's house in darkness, causing them to fade away.
- With the Necronomicon, select a Coven member. Their visitors will fade away, as well as their target. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player fading away will have their ability fail and will have all notifications suppressed. Their vote also will secretly not count.
- At the end of the next day, they will die, with their role and will hidden.
- You ignore all forms of temporary defense.
